Plot: Kyle Peoples never wanted to be the man he has become in his 30s, an accountant stuck in a dead end job, with a lover who is more successful than he and a family that doesn't get him at all...
Title: Meth Head
Writer: Jane Clark (story), Jane Clark, Jane Clark, John W. McLaughlin (story inspired by)
Actors: Lukas Haas, Blake Berris, Necar Zadegan, Wilson Cruz
